cu.explanation_en: Setting Active_gNBs to an invalid list containing 'invalid_gnb' will cause gNB activation failure and prevent the system from starting properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting Active_gNBs to an invalid list containing 'invalid_gnb' will cause gNB activation failure and prevent the system from starting properly.
du.explanation_zh: 將 Active_gNBs 設定為包含 'invalid_gnb' 的無效列表會導致 gNB 啟動失敗，並阻止系統正確啟動。
